structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: If a case is pending in the superior court for Dukes county, in which the inhabitants of a town in said county are disqualified from serving as jurors, a justice of the court may order the clerk thereof to issue writs of venire facias for a sufficient number of jurors to try such case, from any town whose inhabitants are not so disqualified.
